name: Instant 3D - Your games in real 3-D on your 2-D and 3-D TVs
blurb: This system extracts 3-D data from ALL of your games and lets you play them in 3-D on ANY 2-D or 3-D TV for a better gaming experience.

rewards.reward: Join our founding family with an inclusion of your name on our website in the list of Kickstarter angels that helped launch the product. You'll also get updates as we convert the world of gaming to 3-D.

Join our founding family with an inclusion of your name on our website in the list of Kickstarter angels that helped launch the product, plus an emailed Thank You suitable for framing, signed by founder Gene Dolgoff. You'll also get updates as we convert the world of gaming to 3-D.

Get one of our first Instant 3-D Converters at a special low price, plus the rewards above. This is for the early supporters that really get how awesome this is and want to start playing in 3-D as soon as possible. We can only offer a limited number of units at this price. Please add $15 for shipping in the continental US or $25 elsewhere.

Get one of our first Instant 3-D Converters at a great low price before it hits stores, plus the earlier rewards above. This is for early supporters that are ready to play all of their games in 3-D. Please add $15 for shipping in the continental US or $25 elsewhere.

Limited Edition Backer Exclusive - Only available during our LAST WEEK on Kickstarter. Get an exclusive limited edition Instant 3-D Converter complete with an engraved metal plate stating "Special Product-Backer Unit - Thanks from Founder/Inventor Gene Dolgoff", plus the earlier rewards above. Please add $15 for shipping in the continental US or $25 elsewhere.

Kickstarter Exclusive - Reserve an Instant 3-D Converter with your name etched on it showing it is uniquely yours, plus the earlier rewards above. Please add $15 for shipping in the continental US or $25 elsewhere.

Developer Special - Get an initial-run Instant 3-D Converter with SDK and SDK support for one year. We'll also help promote your game for one year, plus you get the earlier rewards above and the right to mark your games with an Instant 3-D Founder Logo.

Elite Developer Special - You get the Developer Special plus priority handling on SDK support. In addition, you and a guest are invited to the Extravagant Instant 3-D Converter Launch Party in New York hosted by a special secret guest. (You have to cover travel and lodging)

Hard Core Gamer Day - We'll put you up for 2 nights with a day in New York (all meals included) with Founder/Inventor Gene Dolgoff to discuss the development of the Instant 3-D Converter, working on Star Trek with Gene Roddenberry, and other topics. You'll get a 3-D video of the day with you in it, and meet awesome members of the gaming community. You also get an Instant 3-D Converter, hand signed by Gene Dolgoff.

Private Dinner and Gamer Day - Attend a private dinner with Gene Dolgoff and team members the night before the Launch Party, attend the Launch Party, and go to Gene Dolgoff's office to see the new, future technologies he is developing. Includes all meals and two night's lodging in New York. You'll get a 3-D video of the day with you in it, and meet awesome members of the gaming community. You also get an Instant 3-D Converter, hand signed by Gene Dolgoff. Your name will also be listed on the Instant 3-D Converters made this year.
